title-part.text: MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR

reference.text: organs, harmoniums or similar wind musical instruments with associated blowing apparatus G10B; pianos, harpsichords, spinets or similar stringed musical instruments with one or more keyboards G10C; automatic musical instruments G10F; electrophonic musical instruments in which tones are generated by electromechanical means G10H

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the specific types of musical instruments are covered in groups G10D1/00, G10D7/00 or G10D13/01, while aspects relevant to the arrangements thereof or the accessories therefor are covered in groups G10D3/00, G10D9/00 or G10D13/10.
This subclass does not cover pianos, harpsichords, spinets or similar stringed musical instruments with keyboards that cause the strings to be struck or plucked, which are covered by subclass G10C.
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

title-part.text: General design of stringed musical instruments

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D1/00 is impacted by reclassification into group G10D1/14.
Groups G10D1/00 and G10D1/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Bowed or rubbed string instruments, e.g. violins or hurdy-gurdies
Plucked or strummed string instruments, e.g. harps or lyres

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D1/04 is impacted by reclassification into group G10D1/05.
Groups G10D1/04 and G10D1/05 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G10D1/05 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G10D1/04.
Groups G10D1/04 and G10D1/05 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G10D1/14 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups G10D1/00 and G10D13/00.
Groups G10D1/00, G10D13/00, and G10D1/14 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Details of, or accessories for, stringed musical instruments, e.g. slide-bars

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D3/06 is impacted by reclassification into group G10D3/095.
Groups G10D3/06 and G10D3/095 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Fingerboards in the form of keyboards
Details of removable or collapsible necks, e.g. suitable for transport or storage

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D3/095 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G10D3/06.
Groups G10D3/06 and G10D3/095 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Anchoring devices for strings, e.g. tail pieces or hitchpins

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D3/12 is impacted by reclassification into group G10D3/13.
Groups G10D3/12 and G10D3/13 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G10D3/13 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G10D3/12.
Groups G10D3/12 and G10D3/13 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Tuning devices, e.g. pegs, pins, friction discs or worm gears
Devices for altering the string tension during playing
Plectra or similar accessories for playing
Chin-rests, hand-rests, shoulder rests or guards being removable from, or integral with the instrument
Winding tools separate from the musical instruments, e.g. tuning keys
Material for manufacturing stringed musical instruments
General design of wind musical instruments

reference.text: accordions or concertinas G10D11/00; whistles G10K5/00

title-part.text: of the type wherein an air current is directed against a ramp edge
with air currents blown into an opening arranged on the cylindrical surface of the tube, e.g. transverse flutes, piccolos or fifes
with a windway for leading the air to the labium, e.g. recorders
Beating-reed wind instruments, e.g. single or double reed wind instruments
Lip-reed wind instruments, i.e. using the vibration of the musician's lips, e.g. cornets, trumpets, trombones or French horns

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D7/12 is impacted by reclassification into group G10D7/16.
Groups G10D7/12 and G10D7/16 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

Group G10D7/16 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from group G10D7/12.
Groups G10D7/12 and G10D7/16 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

note.note-paragraph:
Group G10D9/00 is impacted by reclassification into groups G10D9/10, G10D9/11, and G10D11/00.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.
